entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using dotnet ef 7 tool from with net8 #32155
  • Convert_regular_column_of_temporal_table_to_sparse failing #32154
  • Stop escaping Unicode characters unnecessarily in relational JSON #32152
  • Update attach entity with Json column in EF #32151
  • Investigate compatibility with the new SQL Server native JSON type #32150
  • System.InvalidOperationException: The instance of entity type 'AccountsLabels' cannot be tracked because another instance with the key value '{AccountsTreeEntityId: 65, LabelId: 25}' is already being tracked. When attaching existing entities, ensure that only one entity instance with a given key value is attached. #32149
  • EF8 - Regression on Contains query when column collation is not default DB collation #32147

Closed

  • Improve RuntimeModel building performance #31142
    MQ
  • ForeignKeys, Keys and Indexes on Property should have a strong order defined #19361
    MQ
  • Change IStateManager.StartTrackingFromQuery to use ISnapshot instead of ValueBuffer #31117
    Backlog
  • Altering a nullable column to not null generates invalid SQL commands for migration #32062
    9.0.0
  • EF Core type inheritance to be ignored in OnModelCreating #32145
  • Case expressions may only be nested to level 10 when using SplitQuery() or ToList() inside projection. #32023
    9.0.0
  • UseLazyLoadingProxies is not effect on AddPooledDbContextFactory #32130

PullRequests

Created

  • Attempt to fix 32154 #32157
  • Add a logo #32156

Merged

  • Use OrderedDictionary or Dictionary instead of SortedDictionary in RuntimeModel #32124
  • Change IStateManager.StartTrackingFromQuery to use ISnapshot instead of ValueBuffer #32099
  • [release/8.0] Stabilize versions #32110
  • Bump Azure.Identity from 1.10.2 to 1.10.3 #32139
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #32142
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #32141
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [main] Fix to #32062 - Altering a nullable column to not null generates invalid SQL commands for migration #32102
  • [main] Fix to #32023 - Case expressions may only be nested to level 10 when using SplitQuery() or ToList() inside projection. #32094

Updated

  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.45.0 to 2.58.0 #32140
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [Component governance] Update Azure.Identity dependency #32108
    blocked
